name: 黃馨瑩
objective:
教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

This course aims to advance students’ English proficiency level through theme-based reading/writing and listening/speaking tasks. Essential reading skills such as skimming, scanning, predicting, and inferring will be reviewed and practiced. Students will also be practicing listening and speaking skills they need for everyday conversation and academic purpose through frequent class discussion and various activities.
scorePolicy:
1. Daily Performance: 30%
(a) Check-in Quiz - 10%
(b) Homework and Assignment - 10%
(c) Your attendance and participation - 10%
2. Course Project and Review Exam: 40%
3. Campus-wide Proficiency Test: 30% (期中&期末會考各15%)
materials:
1. Essential Reading 4
2. Q: Skills for Success 4 (Listening/Speaking)
